body_html: While @zheng-xq investigates the issue, may I suggest the following? We have seen cases in which similar memory leaks occur for NVIDIA driver 352, but doesn't occur for NVIDIA driver 361. Can you try upgrading the NVIDIA driver and see if the problem persists?

body: While @zheng-xq investigates the issue, may I suggest the following? We have seen cases in which similar memory leaks occur for NVIDIA driver 352, but doesn't occur for NVIDIA driver 361. Can you try upgrading the NVIDIA driver and see if the problem persists?
